experience.description: Worked on a classified defense technology project as part of a multidisciplinary team. Focused on building robust, high-performance backend systems using .NET technologies. Responsible for designing scalable APIs, optimizing system reliability, and ensuring secure data handling in mission-critical environments. Collaborated closely with frontend developers, QA engineers, and system architects to deliver features on tight deadlines while adhering to strict security protocols.

Led backend and full-stack development in medical imaging, modernizing monolithic systems into scalable web architectures. Owned core radiologist-facing apps, refactored legacy code, and led a POC that scaled data handling 20Ã—. Also rebuilt a DICOM anonymization tool from a complex Python script into a clean, maintainable Angular + .NET solution.
achievements: Application Owner - Knowledge focal point, design, and code owner, and team representative in product discussions
Hackaton Team Lead -  SW developers, QA, and DevOps which developed a POC handles a data size of 20X more than it is currently capable of.

experience.description: Built and improved automation infrastructure and test suites for medical software. Worked with C#, Ranorex, and TestComplete using the Page Object pattern to ensure robust and maintainable UI tests.
